text: Robert "Bob" Bondurant (April 27, 1933 â€“ November 12, 2021) was an American racecar driver. He raced for the Shelby American, Ferrari and Eagle teams. Bondurant was added in the Motorsports Hall of Fame of America in 2003.Bob Bondurant at the Motorsports Hall of Fame of America Bondurant died on November 12, 2021 at his home in Paradise Valley, Arizona at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from California Category:Sportspeople from Evanston, Illinois
